channel.title: Do you have to portforward your server?
channel.description:
I've downloaded No-IP made a host, changed all the IP's to it even though I'm not sure on how to let other people play it because at the moment I still have "127.0.0.1/cache" and I don't know where to put my cache or change the directory. Well back to the point, I've done all the No-IP stuff, do I need to portforward it?
Thanks, -MotionX

item.title: Do you have to portforward your server?
item.dc:creator: @MotionX MotionX
item.description:
@MotionX wrote:

No, I have no idea how to I used my IP and portforward.com.

Thanks, -MotionX

Read full topic
item.source: Do you have to portforward your server?
